enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve the removal of attributes from an element, making removeAttr a suitable method to set up the test environment for clearAttributes.
The attr method can be used to set attributes on an element, which can then be cleared by clearAttributes, providing a suitable setup for testing.
The hasAttributes method can be used to verify that the attributes have been cleared after calling clearAttributes, making it a suitable assertion method.
The attributes method can be used to retrieve the attributes of an element and verify that they have been cleared, providing a suitable assertion for the test.
